meanings.definition: A low-growing plant with small white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The miterwort added a touch of beauty to the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a miterwort while hiking in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The miterwort seemed to be shy, hiding among the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The miterwort's delicate flowers were like tiny stars scattered on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The miterwort's white blooms brightened up the shaded area.

meanings.definition: To cover or adorn with miterwort.
meanings.sent1: She decided to miterwort the garden to create a natural look.
meanings.sent2: The landscaper miterworted the pathway with care.
meanings.sent3: The backyard looked magical after she miterworted it.
meanings.sent4: The garden was transformed into a fairyland with the miterwort covering.
meanings.sent5: The house was beautifully miterworted, enhancing its charm.

meanings.sent1: The miterworting of the garden was a labor of love.
meanings.sent2: Her miterworting skills were evident in the park's design.
meanings.sent3: The miterworting process turned the plain area into a floral paradise.
meanings.sent4: The miterworting project brought a burst of color to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The miterworting event attracted many nature enthusiasts.
